name: Quick Brown Fox Coffee Roasters
description:
Single-estate, direct-trade specialty coffee roasted on order and delivered to your doorstep!
Quick Brown Fox is an independently owned specialty coffee roaster based in New Delhi.
Our passion for coffee and the burgeoning resurgence of coffee culture in India in the last decade prompted us to present a specialty experience in a bag.
We roast in small batches and taste each batch to ensure quality and freshness
